imsmd:title.imsmd:langstring: Zou ba! Visiting China: Is this your first visit?

imsmd:description.imsmd:langstring: Watch two friends talking about holidays. Look at countries they have visited such as China, Great Britain, United States of America, France, Germany, Thailand and South Korea. Investigate how to ask and answer questions about countries visited. This learning object is one in a series of five objects.

tlf:remark.tlf:langstring: Originally published by the NSW Department of Education and Training on CD-ROM as 'Zou ba!'. Zou ba! Levels 1, 2, 3 or Complete was initiated, funded and written by the Professional Support and Curriculum Directorate of the New South Wales Department of Education and Training.

imsmd:otherplatformrequirements.imsmd:langstring: Initial load time and load time on some screens may exceed 10 seconds on a dedicated 64 kbps connection due to the use of rich media content.

tlf:keylearningobjective.tlf:langstring: Students explore the Chinese names for several countries.
Students investigate how to ask and answer questions about whether they have visited a country or not.

tlf:educationalvalue.tlf:langstring: Introduces the Chinese names for several countries.
Provides a series of English questions to test comprehension of a dialogue.
Models spoken questions and answers about countries visited.
Provides opportunities for students to practise the construction of spoken questions and answers.
Includes a listening and reading challenge where students select Chinese characters to match spoken dialogue.
Provides audio, Chinese characters, pinyin and language explanations for all target language content.
